title: Warlock

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Cast a spell on someone each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone that has a spell cast on them dies during the night, they will be cleaned. If they are lynched during the day, however, your spell will have no effect, and they will not be cleaned.

- If you die during the night, all cleaned targets will be revived.

- If you are lynched during the day, all of your targets' information will be revealed, but they will not be revived.

- You will learn your cleaned target's role and gain access to their will, if they had one.

- You may choose to commit suicide on any night instead of casting a spell. This will revive all of your cleaned targets.

desc:
Post 599
*Killing myself and reviving all 3 Mafia Members, hell yeah.*
Detection immunity
